DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine ElectroFluidGraph ( tm ) ( EFG ) impedance analyzer comparable predicate device measure human body composition .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Study Bioelectrical Impedance Device Measure Human Body Composition
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study determine ElectroFluidGraph ( tm ) ( EFG ) impedance analyzer comparable predicate device measure human body composition normal patient condition . Specifically , goal study compare impedance measurement ( R Xc ) determine use bioelectrical impedance device estimate body compositional estimate [ total body water ( TBW ) ; fat-free mass ( FFM ) ; fat mass ( FM ) ] calculate use prediction equation ( model ) predicate device .
